text: Street with a bus stop; Harry standing near the timetable. A middle-aged woman approaches him.
Excuse me, what time is it, please?
Medium shot – the tourist looks at the bus stop sign.
Thank you. Do you know when the next bus goes to the museum?
Yes, it leaves at half past ten from here.
Close-up – Harry pointing at the timetable.
And what time does the museum open?
Wide shot – both smiling, bus arriving in the background.
Perfect, I’ll be there in time. Thank you very much.
You’re welcome. Have a nice day.
